name: koa-session
description: Koa cookie session middleware with external store support

scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha --require should --reporter spec test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should test/*.test.js
